data.headline: Senior UX Designer and Enterprise Architect
data.summary: Experienced UX Designer and Enterprise Architect with a strong background in designing and implementing complex software systems for large corporate clients. Skilled in user research, information architecture, interaction design, and prototyping. Adept at bridging the gap between business requirements and technical implementation.

experience.title: Senior UX Designer and Enterprise Architect
bullets: Designed and implemented user-centric enterprise software solutions for Siemens' industrial automation and energy management divisions.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define and execute the UX strategy, ensuring seamless integration with the overall enterprise architecture.
Conducted user research, created information architectures, and developed high-fidelity prototypes to validate design concepts.
Provided technical leadership and mentorship to junior designers and architects, fostering a culture of continuous improvement.

experience.title: UX Designer and Enterprise Architect
bullets: Designed and implemented user interfaces for BMW's connected car and mobility services platforms.
Defined the enterprise architecture and integration strategy for BMW's digital ecosystem, ensuring seamless data exchange and user experiences.
Facilitated cross-functional workshops to align business requirements with technical capabilities, driving innovation and operational efficiency.

projects.name: Siemens Industrial Automation Platform
projects.description: Designed and implemented the user experience and enterprise architecture for Siemens' next-generation industrial automation platform, enabling seamless integration of production systems and data-driven decision-making.

projects.name: BMW Connected Mobility App
projects.description: Designed the user interface and interaction patterns for BMW's connected mobility app, integrating data from various sources to provide personalized mobility services and recommendations.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. The candidate is a middle-aged man with short, neatly styled brown hair and a friendly, confident expression. He is wearing a dark blue suit and a white shirt.
